SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT304
SwiftMessageFormat.DescriptiveName: Advice/Instruction of a Third Party Deal
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by a fund manager to a custodian bank as an advice of/instruction to settle a third party foreign exchange deal.
The definition of third party must be agreed up front between the fund manager and the custodian relative to deals executed by the custodians' treasury area on behalf of the fund manager.
It is used to:
a) provide details about a new deal
b) provide a settlement notification
c) amend a previously sent message
d) cancel a previously sent message.
This message may also be sent to the member of a centralised settlement system or directly to the centralised settlement system.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: AMND
Code.Description: Replaces a previously sent instruction with the amended one contained in this message. Used to add settlement agents to an MT 304 previously sent -or- to correct error(s) in an MT 304 previously sent -or- to add optional sequences/fields to an MT 304 previously sent.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Cancels a previously sent instruction. Used to cancel an MT 304 previously sent -or- to cancel an MT 304 which contains erroneous information.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Duplicates a previously sent instruction. Used to inform the custodian that an instruction was already sent by telex, fax or SWIFT.

Code.Name: NEWT
Code.Description: Used to send an instruction for the first time -or- to send a corrected MT 304 when the erroneous one was cancelled using an MT 304 with function CANC.

Validation.Comment: Scope must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: AFWD
Code.Description: Indicates that the foreign exchange is a forward/hedge executed for a future date at a set price. The contract is opened and closed for the same value date resulting in a gain or loss. The result can be settled by netting the local base or both currencies, or by settling the gross/principal amounts.

Code.Name: ASET
Code.Description: Indicates that the foreign exchange is a physical settlement in which both the buy and sell currencies will move on the settlement (value) day.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The partial or final close of an FCC.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The partial close of an FCC.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The final close of an FCC.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78).

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).

Option.Name: H
Option.Description: Type, Date, Version of the Agreement

Validation.Comment: Type of Agreement must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47):

Code.Name: OTHER
Code.Description: Another type of bilateral agreement signed up front between party A and party B. The agreement must be specified in field 72.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50)
Version must be a valid year expressed as YYYY (Error code(s): T50).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency.
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO
With option J, the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T78):

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ADD1

Code.Name: GBSC

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 22A is AMND or CANC, then field 21 is mandatory, otherwise it is optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "ASET", A[0].F17O.$size == 0 && A[0].F17N.$size == 0, If($value == "AFWD", A[0].F17O.$size > 0 && A[0].F17N.$size > 0, true))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 94A is ASET, then fields 17O and 17N are not allowed; if field 94A is AFWD, then fields 17O and 17N are mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 17O is Y, then field 17F is not allowed; if field 17O is N, then field 17F is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 17O is not present, then field 17F is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 17O is Y, then sequence D is not allowed; if field 17O is N, then sequence D is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 17O is not present, then sequence D is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-A
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F17F.$size > 0 && A[0].F17N.$size > 0 && A[0].F17F[0].Indicator == "Y" && A[0].F17N[0].Indicator == "Y", E.$size > 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 17F (in sequence A) is Y and field 17N (in sequence A) is Y, then sequence E is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-B
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F17F.$size > 0 && A[0].F17N.$size > 0 && A[0].F17F[0].Indicator == "Y" && A[0].F17N[0].Indicator == "N", E.$size == 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 17F (in sequence A) is Y and field 17N (in sequence A) is N, then sequence E is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-C
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F17F.$size > 0 && A[0].F17N.$size > 0 && A[0].F17F[0].Indicator == "N" && In(A[0].F17N[0].Indicator, "Y", "N"), E.$size == 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 17F (in sequence A) is N and field 17N (in sequence A) is Y or N, then sequence E is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-D
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F17F.$size == 0, If(A[0].F17N.$size > 0, If(In(A[0].F17N[0].Indicator, "Y", "N"), E.$size == 0, true), E.$size == 0), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 17F (in sequence A) is not present and field 17N (in sequence A) is Y or N or not present, then sequence E is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C6
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In field 72 of sequence C, if the code /VALD/ is present, then it must appear in the first 6 characters of the first line and in no other place, followed by a date expressed as YYYYMMDD and the end of line code, that is :72:/VALD/YYYYMMDDCrLf (Error code(s): C58)."

fieldvalidation.name: C7
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C, if field 72 is present then, if the second line starts with /SETC/ it must be followed by a valid ISO 4217 currency code and the end of line separator (that is /SETC/currencyCrLf). If the first six characters of the second line are /SETC/, then the first six characters of the first line must be /VALD/. The code /SETC/ is not allowed in any other place than the first six characters of the second line. If the first six characters of the third line are /SRCE/, then the first six characters of the second line must be /SETC/. The code /SRCE/ is not allowed in any other place than the first six characters of the third line (Error code(s): C59)."

fieldvalidation.name: FC-72-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: FC-29A-A
fieldvalidation.comment: "At least one of the following codes should be used: /DEPT/ followed by the name of the department, /FAXT/ followed by fax number, /NAME/ followed by the name of the contact person, /PHON/ followed by the telephone number, /TELX/ followed by the telex number."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "At least one of the following codes should be used: /DEPT/ followed by the name of the department, /FAXT/ followed by fax number, /NAME/ followed by the name of the contact person, /PHON/ followed by the telephone number, /TELX/ followed by the telex number."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C9-1 In Subsequence B1 Amount Bought, field 32B Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used (Error code(s): C08)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Subsequence B1 Amount Bought, field 32B Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C9-2 In Subsequence B2 Amount Bought, field 33B Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used (Error code(s): C08)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Subsequence B2 Amount Bought, field 33B Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C9-3 In Sequence D Accounting Information, field 32G Currency, Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used (Error code(s): C08)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence D Accounting Information, field 32G Currency, Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-4
fieldvalidation.comment: C9-4 In Sequence E Net Amount to be Settled, field 32G Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used (Error code(s): C08)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence E Net Amount to be Settled, field 32G Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."
